Game works ok, but it's a puzzle because of the language. You can't tell where to go on the menu splash menu splash. When you get the game going it's good, all audio is in english. This is what I found out about the controls:
Movement=WSAD, Jump=Space, Fire=L/Mouse, Weapon select=R, Roll=L/Ctrl, Zoom=L/Shift, After you get your bionic arm, Punch=F, Grapple Cable=R/Mouse. If anyone comes across a patch to enable english menus, please let us know. Cheers.

hello dear all
games is running perfect
and for lanuage in english
here is the solution
open file context.xml with notepad
in forth line at end you find 
language="russian
change it to
language="english
save the file
thats all 
now your game language turns to english

and for cutscene
yes downgraded upto 60% 
and also cutscenes got voice but no audio 
i dont know why
but its ok for approx 6 gb games turns to 1.46 gb
Russian to English trick worked perfectly, this upload is now A+++, Cheers kishanh.
